com.yourmediashelf.scorm.scorm2fedora
Class Scorm2Fedora

java.lang.Object
  com.yourmediashelf.scorm.scorm2fedora.Scorm2Fedora

public class Scorm2Fedora
extends Object

Scorm2Fedora accepts a SCORM 1.2 package with IMS Metadata and deposits it into a Fedora repository. The IMS Metadata is converted into Dublin Core and made available the Fedora object's DC datastream.

Author:
Edwin Shin

Constructor Summary
Scorm2Fedora(Properties props)
          Configuration properties username username for the Fedora repository to be used by Scorm2Fedora to deposit SCORM packages.

Constructor Detail

Scorm2Fedora

public Scorm2Fedora(Properties props)
Configuration properties
username
username for the Fedora repository to be used by Scorm2Fedora to deposit SCORM packages.
password
password for the Fedora user
baseUrl
URL of the Fedora repository (e.g. http://localhost:8080/fedora)
namespace
PID namespace for the SCORM objects (optional)
cmodel
The URI of the cmodel newly created objects (optional)
scorm.dsid
The datastream ID for the SCORM package (e.g. SCORM)

Parameters:
props - configuration properties
